snippet.title: Days of Heroes: D-Day Official Gameplay
snippet.description:
🔧 Exciting news for Days of Heroes: D-Day players!
After the release of Days of Heroes: Stalingrad, we will be rolling out a major update for Days of Heroes: D-Day. The project was on hold for a long time, and rather than patching old mechanics, we’ve decided to rebuild and enhance them from scratch based on the new systems we’re creating for Stalingrad. This means better gameplay, improved mechanics, and fresh content for all D-Day players! Stay tuned for more details!

🔥 Play Days of Heroes: D-Day now!
➡️ Days of Heroes: D-Day on Meta Store : https://www.meta.com/pl-pl/experiences/days-of-heroes-d-day/5680842148663882/

🔥 Try D-Day before you buy!
➡️Days of Heroes: D-Day Demo on Meta Store: https://www.meta.com/pl-pl/experiences/days-of-heroes-d-day-demo/3346478685453854/

🛠️ We’re working on our new game!
➡️ Days of Heroes: Stalingrad – Coming Soon : https://www.meta.com/pl-pl/experiences/days-of-heroes-stalingrad/9217331855000986/

📢 Follow us for updates:
🌍 Website: www.dohvr.com
📷 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/days_of_heroes/
📘 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DaysOfHeroesVR
🎵 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@days_of_heroes
💬 Discord: https://discord.gg/fdJjRDCvyk

It’s the beginning of June 1944. Five years since the start of World War II, the Third Reich continues their occupation of Europe. Allied forces decide to open a so-called “second front” in Western Europe to turn the tides of war. Operation Overlord – the biggest landing operation in history – is about to begin. General Eisenhower sets June 6th as D-Day. Joint forces of American, British, and Canadian troops get ready to land on the Normandy coast. You are among the soldiers about to change the fate of the world.

Complete diverse military missions – engage in both close-quarters and long-range combat, operate anti-aircraft guns, destroy enemy tanks, break through trenches, and even escape from a POW camp. Use a wide variety of World War II-era weapons, meticulously recreated in both appearance and mechanics.

After finishing the campaign, hone your skills on the shooting range, featuring four different gameplay modes. Once you’re ready, unlock Hardcore Mode, which will test your strategy, cleverness, and survival instincts to the extreme.
See you on the battlefield !
